name: specialist-active-shift.toml
rawContent:
# Active Shift Route
# Current active work shift

[route]
id = "specialist-active-shift"
path = "/prototype/specialist/shift"
title = "Active Shift"

[page]
type = "authenticated"
role = "specialist"

[page.description]
summary = "Active shift management screen"
features = [
  "Current order details",
  "Start/End shift buttons",
  "Time tracking display",
  "Order address and client info"
]

[relations]
guards = ["authenticated", "specialist-only"]
roles = ["specialist"]
entities = ["order"]
platforms = ["specialist-app"]
useCases = ["start-shift", "end-shift"]
components = ["active-shift", "order-card"]
events = ["shift-started", "shift-ended"]

[implementation]
component = "ActiveShift"
file = "src/prototype/pages/specialist/ActiveShift.tsx"
status = "planned"
